channel.title: Help with utorrent :S
channel.description:
Ok ive followed all the steps right. Its worked all the time before how ive hosted it, now it doesnt work. Ive tried installing and reinstaling not working :(.
Which order do you put it in?
This is what i have put.
[IMG]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm105/cookingthero/untitled.jpg[/img]
The order i put it in is.
Run no-ip let it load (boxes are ticked by default) Run my server Then run utorrent
Is that correct? if not whats wrong? Btw i have latest utorrent 1.8.1. My no-ip is working fine.It says so "no update needed"

item.title: Help with utorrent :S
item.dc:creator: @Owner-Fugh Owner-Fugh
item.description:
@Owner-Fugh wrote:

Well, I recommend getting TeamViewer But IDK. OK, from now. Just use the Router, it’s easier to port forward. It’s less complicated. UTorrent is too much of a hassle. This is not spam it’s a suggestion ffs.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with utorrent :S
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

i havent port fowarded. i use utorrent+ plus i hate teamviewer people always use it to hack

Read full topic

item.title: Help with utorrent :S
item.dc:creator: @Owner-Fugh Owner-Fugh
item.description:
@Owner-Fugh wrote:

No no no, that’s a good thing! Blushing means the IP works and it’s online. It’s your Port Forwarding. Do you have Team-Viewer I can help you if you do. If so, PM me the ID and pass.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with utorrent :S
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

it still blushing even after 5 attempts

Read full topic

item.title: Help with utorrent :S
item.dc:creator: @Owner-Fugh Owner-Fugh
item.description:
@Owner-Fugh wrote:

OK, Now… A. Don’t tell me what I can and can’t do. B. I’m trying to help you. C. I own a server I go through this every day.

OK, Now answer my question is it a Smile with a blush, sunglasses or a happy face - : D.

Because that’s what the problem is. If it has a smile with a blush uncheck and recheck. It SHOULD be fine then.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with utorrent :S
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

i do, but A. portfowarding slows your internet connection down. I have done that. Don’t post unless its absoultely necssiary

Read full topic

item.title: Help with utorrent :S
item.dc:creator: @Owner-Fugh Owner-Fugh
item.description:
@Owner-Fugh wrote:

OK, Uncheck and re-check your No-ip Boxes. ONLY if they have sunglasses or a face like :D. Now, why can’t you use a regular Router to do it?

Read full topic
